heading: Today
text: Partly sunny. More period of clouds and a few snow showers north. Much colder
temperature: Upper teens and 20s north, 25 to 30 south

heading: Monday Night
text: Partly cloudy, a few flurries, then cloudy.

heading: Tuesday
text: Snow spreading northeast. A few to several inches total.
temperature: Mid 20s to low 30s north to south

heading: Wednesday
text: Morning snow northeast tapering off. Partly sunny southwest.
